description: In this course, students consolidate their knowledge and skills by engaging in a short placement in an organisation. Further information can be found on the BEL Faculty  website.
prerequisites:
Single Bachelor degree students: minimum of 24 units with a cumulative GPA of 5.0.
Dual Bachelor degree students: minimum of 32 units with a cumulative GPA of 5.0.
restricted: Approval required from Head of School via BEL Student Experience Team.
